aims_scope: The Journal of Peace Service Academy (JoPSA) serves as a critical nexus for interdisciplinary research at the intersection of conflict transformation, administrative science, and sustainable development. We prioritize manuscripts that challenge existing paradigms and offer empirical frameworks for peace infrastructures.

why_publish.title: Rigorous Peer Review
why_publish.desc: Our double-blind review process ensures that every published manuscript meets the highest standards of academic integrity and methodological soundness.

why_publish.title: Global Open Access
why_publish.desc: We believe knowledge should be free. Your research is immediately available to a global audience of policymakers, scholars, and practitioners without paywalls.

why_publish.title: Rapid Dissemination
why_publish.desc: Our streamlined editorial workflow reduces the time from submission to publication, ensuring your findings reach the field while they are most relevant.
